typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		source_column as string,
		target_column as string,
		key as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LookUpRef
LookUpRef keyGenerate(output({Emp SID} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive({DEPT ID } = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> FetchColumn
FetchColumn, LookUpRef lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
